serverSide.sharedRegions

Class ArrivalTerminalTransferQuay

  • java.lang.Object
    • serverSide.sharedRegions.ArrivalTerminalTransferQuay

  • public class ArrivalTerminalTransferQuay
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the Arrival Terminal Transfer Quay shared region. The passengers can take (and enter) a bus if they are in transit after the bus driver announces the bus for them.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int cntPassengersInBus
      Count of the number of passengers that entered in the bus
      protected MemFIFO<java.lang.Thread> inTheBus

    • Method Detail

      • takeABus

        public void takeABus(int id)
        The passenger takes a bus and it gets into the queue with the passengers waiting for the bus

      • enterTheBus

        public void enterTheBus(int id)
                 throws SharedException
        The passengers are blocked until the bus driver announces the bus. A passenger enters the bus, moving from the waiting queue to the bus. They can't get in if the bus is full and keep waiting.
        Throws:
        SharedException - if the number of passengers in queue is negative or if it is higher than the queue's capacity

      • hasDaysWorkEnded

        public char hasDaysWorkEnded()
        The bus driver ends his job or returns to work
        Returns:
        'W' if he is going to work again

      • announcingBusBoarding

        public void announcingBusBoarding()
        The bus driver will unlock the passengers that are waiting to enter the bus. If the end of the day isn't reached, it blocks the bus driver until the time quantum terminates or the bus gets full

      • parkTheBus

        public void parkTheBus()
        The bus driver parks the bus at the arrival terminal

      • setEndOfWord

        public void setEndOfWord()
        Sets the end of work for the bus driver

      • incCntPassengersInBus

        public void incCntPassengersInBus()
        Increments the number of passengers in the bus when a passenger gets in to help managing the capacity

      • decCntPassengersInBus

        public void decCntPassengersInBus()
        Decrements the number of passengers in the bus when a passenger gets out to help managing the capacity

      • getCntPassengersInBus

        public int getCntPassengersInBus()
        Returns the number of passengers in the bus
        Returns:
        the number of passengers inside the bus

      • readFromBus

        public void readFromBus()

      • shutServer

        public void shutServer()
